data.title: The Amateur Players Tour
data.meta_description: Amateur Golfers from the US and Canada who love tournament golf, playing great golf courses, and competing against players of their own skill level are joining the Amateur Players Tour, an elite Amateur Golf Tour.
data.text:
44

Chapters Nationwideand counting!

By The Players,

For The Players™

Compete against players of similar skill level and get treated like a pro! The APT provides a professionally-run tournament experience for players of all skill levels.

Join The Tour

Tour Schedule

2024 APT Midwest Open Results – French Lick Resort

2024 North American Championship

2024 Seniors North American Championship

Why should I join an amateur golf tour?

Amateur Golfers from the United States and Canada who love tournament golf, playing great golf courses, and competing against players of their own skill level are joining the Amateur Players Tour, to enjoy professionally-run amateur golf tournaments.

Divisions for Every Skill Level

Division 1 - 3.4 & Below

Division 2 - 3.5 - 8.4

Division 3 - 8.5 - 13.4

Division 4 - 13.5 - 18.4

Division 5 - 18.5 & Above

Players compete in golf tournaments at the local level in a season-long points race with players being divided into five divisions based upon their skill level to provide fun and fair competition. Division champions will be crowned at each event, with the winners receiving a trophy and all prize pools paid out in VISA Gift Cards. Local Players of the Year will be crowned in every local chapter.

Like to travel? APT members have the opportunity to compete in national majors at bucket-list venues such as Big Cedar Lodge, Streamsong Resort, and Chambers Bay. Players seek to qualify for the North American Championship, where National Players of the Year will be crowned in each division. Seniors have an option to compete in each local chapter and qualify for a Senior-only Championship each year. Divisions are assigned based on Amateur Players Tour Tournament Index, calculated using players tournament scores with the APT. The APT observes the USGA Rules of Golf governing competition and amateur status.

Our members shared with us why they love the Amateur Players Tour:

Compete in a division with similar handicaps

Play a local and national tour schedule

Compete for season long points and qualify for the North American Championship

Play where the pros play

Focus on Pace of Play, creating enjoyable, efficient rounds

Enjoy amazing camaraderie with fellow participants

Options for Seniors and Ladies

2024 Tour Player Membership

price

CAD per season

Membership gives you the ability to compete in over 800 local events across our expansive network in the United States and Canada, compete in over 15 National Majors at some of the best golf courses on the continent, compete in a local Player of the Year race and a National Player of the Year Race, qualify for the season ending North American Championship and Senior North American Championship and more!

Unlimited Tournament Access

Exclusive discounts from our national partners

APT Tournament Index

Benefits and Perks

Divisions for Everyone

Divisions determined by your APT Tournament Index based on APT Tournament Scores. Options for Seniors and Ladies too!

Community

Play competitive golf, have fun, and develop life-long friendships. Join our community of passionate golfers!

Awards and Prizes

Each Division winner receives a trophy, and top finishers in each Division win VISA Gift Cards. Players compete for Local and National Player of the Year honors!

Top-Rated Courses

Play the top-rated public and private courses in your area, with the ability to travel to majors at bucket-list destinations at some of the best golf resorts in North America!

Download our App

Download our Amateur Players Tour App for FREE in your app store and get access to live scoring, schedules, stats, tour updates, and more! The easiest way to stay connected to the APT!

Presenting Sponsor

$50 Credit Partner Perk

As a member of the 2023 Amateur Players Tour, you receive a $50 credit on GlobalGolf.com

Join The Tour

globalgolf.com

Very Proud to Partner With

Players have the ability to become a Folds of Honor Partner! Your membership includes everything in Player Badge plus a $75 donation to Folds of Honor; a nonprofit organization that provides educational scholarships to the families of fallen or disabled military heroes and first responders. Help us honor their sacrifice and educate their legacy. Folds of Honor Foundation received a Candid Platinum Seal and a 4/4 stars rating from Charity Navigator with $.91 of every dollar going directly to scholarships. APT members raised $100,000 for Folds of Honor in 2023.

HELP US ACHIEVE OUR GOAL OF $150,000!

$129,883

September 22-24, 2023 | Myrtle Beach, SC

2023 North American Championship

Join us for the 2023 North American Championship in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina this September 22nd. Includes five different courses in the Myrtle Beach area, players will be competing to be crowned "North American Champion."

APT Testimonials

"A well-run competitive tour that lines up some great courses I might not get the chance to otherwise. Good community, good golf."

Eric Strange

Carolina Triad

"Finally a tour that actually puts in the effort to provide their members a fantastic experience and benefits with your membership"

Jake Englebrake

Kansas City

"APT is by far the best tour I’ve played on. Brought my love of golf back. Can’t say enough about everyone who plays in it and everyone who runs it. Unreal venues and we're paid out with Visa gift cards. Great tour ran by even better people!"

Tyler F.

St. Louis | Division 1

"I've played on every am-tour in the country and nothing compares to APT. From the bigger prize purses, professional notifications, member discounts, tee box care factor, pace of play, and overall organization. Nothing comes close."

Rick P.

Charlotte | Division 2

"Great tour! Lots of great venues to play. I have played courses I would have never played had I not been on the tour. Made new lifetime friends!"

Wilson G.

Wilson-Review

Frequently Asked Questions

The Amateur Players Tour is the fastest growing am tour on the continent, with over 40 chapters across the United States and Canada, consisting of a local schedule in each market, national events at bucket-list destinations, and a season-ending championship (open and senior) for top finishers in each local chapter. The APT provides a professionally run tournament experience for the everyday golfer of all ages and ability levels, allowing golfers to compete against players of their own skill level at some of the best golf facilities in their area and across the continent.

Membership is open to players of all ages and skill levels who love competitive golf and camaraderie. We offer 5 divisions based on your skill level, with options for seniors in every chapter. Ladies play from a tee with a similar rating to the tee of their male division counterparts, creating an equitable atmosphere for women.

100%! The Amateur Players Tour is an inclusive community of golfers dedicated to competition, camaraderie and support to help each of our members achieve their golfing goals. We have everyone from plus handicaps to the 30+ handicapper who is just starting to play but enjoys competition. Join and become part of the best golf community on the planet!

The Amateur Players Tour offers 5 different divisions for players to compete in:

Division Handicap Range Division 1 3.4 & Below Division 2 3.5 – 8.4 Division 3 8.5 – 13.4 Division 4 13.5 – 18.4 Division 5 18.5 & Above

New players will fill out the APT Handicap Questionnaire, sent to them upon joining which will be used to place the player in their correct division. The APT Competition Committee will use the 12-month low USGA Handicap if available, other tournament data, as well as the handicap questionnaire to determine the proper division placement. New players can request relegation after 2 rounds by submitting an e-mail to the Competition Committee at handicaps@aptgolf.org.

The APT is open to all amateur golfers. The player membership fee is $135 and is good for 365 days from the day of purchase. Membership renewals extend the membership for an additional 365 days from the previous membership expiration date regardless of the date of renewal purchase. Membership includes a $50 pro shop credit to amateurplayersshop.com, exclusive discounts from our national partners in our pro shop AND on various products and services at our vendor websites, plus the ability to register for any tournament in our expansive network. Please allow up to 30 days for credits to be active and be on the lookout for an email explaining how to use these exclusive benefits. Players can also choose to become a Folds of Honor Partner for $210, which includes a $75 donation to Folds of Honor.
